title: Inception
description: A thief enters people's dreams to steal their secrets.

title: Jungle Cruise
description: A riverboat captain takes a scientist and her brother on a dangerous journey through the Amazon jungle.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Various interconnected stories unfold in the criminal underworld of Los Angeles.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces off against the Joker in a battle for Gotham City.
